name: 甘奈
text:
千雪さーん！　いるー？
……あ、甜花ちゃん、大丈夫？
trans:
Chiyuki-san! Are you there?
...Ah, Tenka-chan, are you alright?

name: 甜花
text:
……はぁ……はぁ
う、うん……大丈夫……！
trans:
...Haa...Haa...
Y-Yeah... I'm fine...!

name: 千雪
text:
あら、甘奈ちゃん、甜花ちゃん
ずいぶん急いで来たのね？
trans:
Oh my, if it isn't Amana-chan and Tenka-chan.
It seems like you came in a hurry.

name: 甘奈
text:
うん、そうなんだ！
早く知らせたくって！
trans:
Yup, we did!
We wanted to tell you as soon as possible!

name: 甘奈
text: えっとね、この子たちなんだけど──
trans: See, we have these with us andー

name: 千雪
text:
まぁ、クマさんたち
こんにちは～
trans:
Wow, bears!
Hello~

name: 甜花
text:
なーちゃんも、甜花も……
学年の……優秀賞に、なった……！
trans:
Naa-chan... and Tenka too...
We both got... an award for excellence in our year level...!

name: 千雪
text:
わぁ……！　それは素敵ね……！
おめでとう、甘奈ちゃん、甜花ちゃん
trans:
Wow...! That's wonderful...!
Congratulations, Amana-chan, Tenka-chan.

name: 甘奈
text:
ありがと！
……まぁ、全然１位とかじゃないんだけどー
trans:
Thank you!
...Well, it wasn't really something like first place butー

name: 甜花
text:
あの……これ……
プ、プレゼント……！
trans:
Uhm... This...
A present...!

name: 千雪
text:
ええっ
……わぁ、お揃いのクマさん！
trans:
Oh!
...Wow, a matching bear!

name: 千雪
text: ほんとに作ってくれたのね……！
trans: You really made one for me...!

name: 甜花
text:
うん……
千雪さんもいなきゃ……だめ……だから……
trans:
Yup...
It's just not the same... without Chiyuki-san too... so...

name: 千雪
text: まあ……
trans: Oh dear...

name: 甘奈
text:
見て見て！
ここ、ユリの飾りをつけてるんだー！
trans:
Look, look!
We put a lily accessory here!

name: 千雪
text: これ……よくできてるわね！
trans: This... This is really well made!

name: 甘奈
text:
うん、この前、
アクセサリー教えてもらったから、応用編だよー☆
trans:
Yeah, last time,
you taught us how to do this, so we just applied what we learned☆

name: 甜花
text: 甜花は……茎、つくった……！
trans: Tenka... made its stalk...!

name: 千雪
text:
あらあら、そうなの……
私……すっごく嬉しい……！
trans:
Oh my, is that so...
I'm really... happy...!

name: 千雪
text: ありがとう……甘奈ちゃん、甜花ちゃん
trans: Thank you... Amana-chan, Tenka-chan.

name: 甜花
text: にへへ……
trans: Nihehe...

name: 甘奈
text:
もう、なんか照れるよー
お礼は甘奈たちが言わなきゃなのに
trans:
I'm getting kinda embarrassedー
Even though we wanted to show you our gratitude no matter what

name: 千雪
text:
ううん
あのね……
trans:
No, that's fine.
The truth is...

name: 千雪
text: 私からもプレゼント、あるんだ
trans: I also have a present for both of you.

name: 甘奈
text: えっ、なになに？
trans: Really? What is it?

name: 千雪
text:
ふふ、はーい
クマさんたちの、お揃いのお洋服
trans:
Fufu, here you go~
Matching dresses for your stuffed bears.

name: 甘奈
text:
うわー、すっごーーい！
甘奈たちの制服と一緒だー！
trans:
Wow! That's amazing!
It's the same outfit as ours!

name: 甜花
text:
……！
着せてみて……いい……？
trans:
...!
Is it alright... if we try it on...?

name: 千雪
text:
もちろんよ
着せてあげて
trans:
Of course it is.
I'll let you put them on.

name: 甜花
text:
て、甜花、
手を洗ってくる……！
trans:
T-Tenka,
will go and wash her hands...!

name: 千雪
text: ふふ……
trans: Fufu...

name: 甘奈
text:
千雪さんって……
本当に、雑貨とかが好きなんだねー
trans:
Chiyuki-san...
You really do love things like sundries.

name: 千雪
text:
うん？　そうね……
だーい好きよ。いつも離れられない物なの
trans:
Hm? That's right...
I really love them. They're things that can't be taken away from me.

name: 甘奈
text: 毎日、アイドル活動で忙しくしてるのに？
trans: Even though you're busy everyday with your idol activities?

name: 千雪
text:
ええ。本当に好きだから、
忙しくても、忘れられないのかも……
trans:
Yeah. I really do love them,
so even if I'm busy, I can't just forget about them...

name: 千雪
text:
アイドル衣装を着ても
この服に似合う雑貨を作りたいな、って考えたり
trans:
Even when I wear my idol outfit,
I think about how I want to make accessories that match it and stuff.

name: 千雪
text: もうきっと、しみついて私の一部になってるのね
trans: Without a doubt, it's something that's been ingrained into me.

name: 甘奈
text:
そっかぁ……
だから、千雪さんは雑貨づくりをやめないんだね
trans:
I see...
So that's why Chiyuki-san hasn't stopped making sundries.

name: 甘奈
text:
なんか……
なんか、すごいね
trans:
It's like...
It's pretty amazing.

name: 甘奈
text: 甘奈には──
trans: In Amana's caseー

name: 千雪
text:
ふふ……
甘奈ちゃんには、そういうのない……って思う？
trans:
Fufu... In Amana-chan's case, 
there isn't anything like that... is what you're thinking, right?

name: 甘奈
text: う、うん……わかんなくって
trans: Y-Yeah... I can't think of any.

name: 千雪
text: そうかしら？
trans: Is that really the case?

name: 甘奈
text: え？
trans: Eh?

name: 千雪
text:
きっと……
それに気づくまでは、「ない」って思うのね
trans:
Surely...
Until you notice what it is, you'll keep thinking there's nothing.

name: 千雪
text: 大丈夫よ、甘奈ちゃんもすぐに気づくわ
trans: Don't worry, I'm sure Amana-chan will notice it soon enough too.

name: 甘奈
text: そ、そうかな……
trans: I-I wonder...

name: 千雪
text:
うん！
千雪先生が言うんだから、きっと。
trans:
Yup!
That's what Teacher Chiyuki is saying, so you definitely will.

name: 千雪
trans: ...Right?

name: 甘奈
text:
へへー、そっかぁ
ありがと
trans:
Hehe, I see.
Thank you.

name: 甘奈
text:
千雪先生っていうか……
なんか、甘奈たちにお姉ちゃんができたみたい
trans:
Rather than Teacher Chiyuki...
It's more like you've become our older sister.

name: 千雪
text: ええ？
trans: You think so?

name: 甜花
text:
よ、よし……！
甜花、ジャケット……着せるね……！
trans:
A-Alright...!
Tenka... will now put on the jacket, okay...!

name: 甘奈
text:
あ、わーい、甘奈も甘奈もー
手、洗ってこよー
trans:
Ah, yay! Amana also wants to!
I'll go and wash my hands!

name: 千雪
text: 甘奈ちゃん……
trans: Amana-chan...

name: 甜花
text: あ、あの……
trans: U-Uhm...

name: 千雪
text:
……？
どうしたの？　甜花ちゃん
trans:
...?
What's the matter, Tenka-chan?

name: 甜花
text:
ち……千雪さんって……
甜花たちの、お姉ちゃん……みたい……
trans:
C-Chiyuki-san...
is like our... older sister...

name: 甘奈
text:
わー、いいねそれ！
“千雪お姉ちゃん”、これからも、よろしくね☆
trans:
Wow! That sounds nice!
"Big Sis Chiyuki", let's get along from now on too!
